@midge8: During Season One fans of Spartacus organized a sort of crusade and called me "motherfucker" many times.  

It must be that, right?

@20-40: you can certainly count me out of the CRUSADERS that called you muthafucker. i remember dl spartacus from you 1 or 2 months before it was officially aired. i beg of you to kindly ignore the muthafuckas for that and consider that a lot of us appreciate what you've been doing for us. Thanx for your anticipated understanding. as always, RESPECT!!!!
Thanks for Fringe, Supernatural, Star Wars, Young Justice, Spartacus

@highres99: Instead of been happy, to have a look on first two episodes before the airing  - I obviously rattled their cage too much - and to the point when I swore to myself to never ever even touch that show (which I haven't watched myself 'cause I have no interest at all). Well, now, I bite the shit every week and encode human-acceptable size... and present fans of Spartacus show should understand that I would encode future episodes only as "secondaries".

@20-40: primary or secondary priority, it really dont matter. good thing's that you've even reconsidered doing the show and for that, myself and countless others appreciate it a lot. i'm quite sure that majority of those that dl from you are probably unregistered members of this wonderful family(TPB) we belong to, and i'm also pretty sure that upon the bad/negative comments the ingrates leave behind, they actually dl from you, too. thanx for your understanding, and i pray incidents like these dont affect yr judgement with regards to doing shows for the good guys. RESPECT!!
